{{Lang|'''Otogi Wood'''|ja=御伽材|ja_rm=Otogi-zai}} is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Otogi Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Otogi Wood can be found on [[Yashiori Island]].

It is also common on [[Narukami Island]], on the larger island of [[Kannazuka]], and in [[Watatsumi Island]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=217 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Other Uses==
* 10 Otogi Woods are used in the {{Quest|To Make a Cat Carving}}.

==Trivia==
* In-universe, the name "Otogi tree" means "the tree that keeps one company." This originates from nursery rhymes which portray the tree as the "whisper of nature."<ref>Tutorial: [[Tutorial/Collecting Wood|Collecting Wood]]</ref>
* The Otogi tree has essential oils in it which can be used to repel mosquitos.<ref>{{Ref/Furnishing|Camp Bonfire: Glorious Clarity}}</ref>
